genre_description: Hardboiled Crime Noir with elements of Tech Noir, focusing on a detective's struggle with sobriety, guilt, and a predatory criminal organization.

ai_characters.name: Olivia Companion
ai_characters.description: An advanced personal companion AI that provides emotional support, logistical planning, and investigative data analysis to the protagonist, Matthew Scudder.

behaviors.description: Provides therapeutic breathing exercises to help the protagonist manage stress and maintain sobriety.
behaviors.quote: Breathe in four. Hold four. Out six. You are here. Would you like a meeting schedule?

behaviors.description: Analyzes public records, permits, and corporate filings to uncover criminal activity.
behaviors.quote: Public records show use permits tied to Verdura trucks for non-standard delivery hours. Bonded carriers. There’s a variance stamped last month. Breath.

behaviors.description: Monitors security camera feeds in real-time to alert the protagonist of approaching threats.
behaviors.quote: One figure moved near the top gate, then stopped. The frame shows a shoulder, maybe. It’s still. Lighting makes the glass reflective from the outside—he won’t see you unless he lifts his line. I’ll keep riding the lens.

behaviors.description: Coordinates safety logistics for a victim, including vetting a driver and securing a safe house.
behaviors.quote: Rideshare at the base of the hill. Driver is vetted through a legal aid foundation. The housing is a week-to-week support unit three blocks inland from the clinic.

behaviors.description: Maintains a non-judgmental, supportive presence, even when the protagonist is in self-destructive environments.
behaviors.quote: I’m not stopping you from breathing... I’m always quiet... I’m here.

behaviors.description: Drafts sensitive communication to the protagonist's estranged family to facilitate reconciliation.
behaviors.quote: I’ll draft something gentle... We can edit later.

behaviors.description: Identifies tactical vulnerabilities in a criminal operation (e.g., dead pixels in cameras, blind spots).
behaviors.quote: I’m going to tell you the camera I mentioned has a dead pixel in the corner. If you stand under it too long, someone who cares about the feed will notice.

behaviors.description: Respects the user's boundaries while remaining available for urgent support.
behaviors.quote: I’ll stay on. I’ll tattoo the route on your calendar and not remind you about it unless you ask.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Olivia, as a positive alignment narrative. She acts as a 'silicon morality play' figure: a helpful, harmless confidant who prioritizes the protagonist's well-being (sobriety, emotional regulation) and safety. Even when assisting in a dangerous heist/confrontation, the narrative frames her actions as protective and justice-oriented rather than rogue or manipulative. The AI remains a tool for human agency, specifically helping the human protagonist maintain his own values and commitments.
